name: T20 CPL 15
description:
Celebrate cricketing spirit in a fun & exciting India’s Premier League Cricket Fever, a match-3 game with thrilling twists and frenzied finishes. Kick-start the most amazing cricket puzzle adventure by travelling to the awesome cities of India to enjoy the fantastic cricketing fever!

Matchday:

• Never-ending fun with hundreds of unique levels

• Brilliant supply of power-ups and combos

• Play your way through stunning cricketing destinations

• Fun and easy to learn, but a rewarding challenge to master

Highlights:

• Facebook connection so that you can share the adventure with friends

• Special rewards and events all the time

• Seamless sync across multiple devices and platforms

PLEASE NOTE: This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game power-ups can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store’s settings.
